summary: This is an email chain forwarding a press release from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York announcing the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors. The email includes congratulatory remarks on the work done.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the co-conspirator with Ghislaine Maxwell in the sexual abuse of minors.

connections.description: Charged together for conspiring to sexually abuse minors.

events.title: Ghislaine Maxwell Charged
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is charged in Manhattan federal court for conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was formally charged on July 2, 2020.
The charges relate to conspiring with Jeffrey Epstein to sexually abuse minors.
The indictment was brought in Manhattan federal court.
The document is a forwarded press release from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
